body:
My initial tests in https://github.com/golang/go/issues/14934#issuecomment-251766351 were run on the wrong revision of Go; namely Go 1.6 rather than tip.

The comparison has been updated above. @randall77, my results do not seem to mirror yours. Any idea as to why this may happen? Can I assist with some additional information?

At least on my laptop, Go 1.4 outperforms Go 1.6 by ~2x, while Go 1.6 outperforms Go tip (rev b9fd510cd00b6aa26e2ea7001a07b90ebf97d2ed) by another ~3x.
